ApplicationDescription: Reserve times for tutoring, seminars and workshops.
HeaderLabelNoGroupMembership: Not a member of any group
NoTimeSlotsDescription: There are no available slots published with the selected filters.
SlotListingHeaderInstructor: Listing {{slots}} slots with you as instructor from {{from}} {{to}}:
SlotReservationTimeInPast: Time for this slot has passed.
SlotReservationGroupIsReserved: Your group is reserved for this slot.
SlotReservationIndividualIsReserved: You are reserved for this slot.
ReserveSlotModalLabelMessage: Questions or feedback to the instructor:
ReserveSlotModalLabelMessageInvalidFeedb: Please enter a message in the text area.
ReserveSlotModalLabelReservationGroupNoM: Not a member of a group
ReserveSlotModalMsgGroupNoticeTitle: This is a reservation for a whole group.
ReserveSlotModalMsgGroupNoticeText: When you reserve this time, you and all the members of the group will get a confirmation sent to your Canvas Inbox.
ReserveSlotModalMsgGroupConnectNoticeTit: This time slot is reserved with another group.
ReserveSlotModalMsgGroupConnectNoticeTex: When you reserve this time, you and all the members of the group will get a confirmation sent to your Canvas Inbox. Both groups will also get instructions on how to prepare for the meeting.
ReserveSlotModalMsgUserNotInGroupTitle: You are not a member of a group.
ReserveSlotModalMsgUserNotInGroupText: To reserve this time slot you must be a member of a group. Please contact an instructor or examiner.
ReserveSlotModalMsgErrorLoadingText: The server did not respond. Please try again later.
CancelSlotReservationModalMsgNotCancelab: You can no longer cancel this reservation. Please contact the instructor for urgent matters.
CancelSlotReservationModalMsgGroupNotice: This is a reservation for a whole group.
When you cancel the reservation, the whole group is affected. A confirmation message will be sent to the group in Canvas Inbox.
CancelSlotReservationApiResponseNotCance: Cancellation time has passed, not possible to cancel.
GeneralErrorMessageMissingAdminAccess: You must have administrator privileges to access this page.
AdminHelpPaneDescription: This page is intentionally left blank for the moment.
AdminCanvasHelpPaneDescription:
Configuration for the course in Canvas where the tool is used.

If there are many groupsets and a student could be a member of many groups in different groupsets, you can filter the valid groupsets.

If no particular groupset is selected, then all are valid.
AdminCourseDescription: Types of time slots available in this Canvas course
AdminCourseHelpPaneContent:
A time slot must have a type before it can be created.

The type controls if it's a group or individual slot, max reservations, texts in messages etc.
AdminCourseModalDeleteNotDeletableText: This type is connected to existing time slots in this course and can not be deleted.
AdminCourseModalLabelMaxNumber: Number of seats per time slot
AdminCourseModalLabelMaxPerType: Max reservations in total for this type
AdminCourseModalLabelMessageIsMandatory: Message field is mandatory when reserving a slot
AdminCourseModalLabelMessageAllWhenFull: Connect groups with a separate message when all seats are reserved
AdminCourseModalLabelMessageCcInstructor: Send a copy of all messages to the instructor
